snippet: Three militants were reported killed in North Waziristan as the C.I.A. appeared to end a suspension of attacks that had lasted almost two months.
abstract: Three militants are reported killed in North Waziristan area of Pakistan as the CIA appears to end a suspension of drone attacks that had lasted almost two months.
lead_paragraph: Three militants were reported killed in North Waziristan as the C.I.A. appeared to end a suspension of attacks that had lasted almost two months.

headline.seo: C.I.A. Drone Strikes Resume in Pakistan
headline.main: 3 Killed as Drone Strikes Resume in Pakistan
